name: SCUOS
description:
SCUOS is a puzzle game where you need to reproduce patterns from one board on another. How many levels can you pass?
There are three board sizes: 4x4, 5x5, 6x6. Each board has own leaders table with high scores.
Features:
  • Brain-training gameplay
  • Challenging levels
  • Minimalistic design
  • Leaderboards

Contact e-mail: contact@palenogames.ru
